context: Analyze this supine backbend pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Wheel Pose (Urdhva Dhanurasana) Full backbend with hands and feet on ground. Consider the Full body strength, extreme heart opening, wrist strength. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Full backbend with hands and feet on ground
practitioner.primaryFocus: Full body strength, extreme heart opening, wrist strength

specificNeeds: Full body strength, extreme heart opening, wrist strength
